data.message: Hello and excuse me. I am experiencing some problems with some messages I had archived. I would truly appreciate it if I could recover the contents of the chat's full history for sentimental reasons and such. Currently it says the messages have been removed until user has been verified. I simply wish to have a copy of the chats history. Thank you in advance.

replies.message: Hi Abdullah! Thanks for your question! It sounds like your friend has been asked to verify their identity. We ask that you wait patiently until they've completed the verification process. Once this has been done, you should be able to see your friend's account online again. Thanks! -Caitlin
